author: Danielle Dawson
title: Insurance could return to these high risk areas in San Diego under new CA policy
text:
SAN DIEGO (FOX 5/KUSI) — California is looking at ways to intervene in the burgeoning insurance crisis gripping homeowners in neighborhoods with high wildfire risk.
Earlier this month, the
state Department of Insurance released new details about a plan that is part of a yearlong effort to overhaul California’s insurance code in hopes of bolstering coverage of communities impacted by the recent exodus of private home insurers from the state.
California Department of Insurance Commissioner David Lara has billed the multi-pronged plan, which was first announced last fall, as “the most significant insurance reform” in three decades.
The latest initiative would span dozens of high-risk zip codes across California, including 19 in San Diego County, who have been left with just the state’s FAIR Plan — or another last-ditch, bare-bones policy with hefty premiums — to cover their home.
The adjustment addresses what Lara described as a shortcoming in the state’s insurance code that allows insurers significant leeway to write their own policies — something he says has contributed to companies pulling out of areas they deem too risky.
Under the new regulations, large insurance companies would be required to write new policies that would allow a minimum of 85% of residents in wildfire distressed areas, which were identified based on concentrations of the state’s FAIR plan, to move back to their coverage.
Smaller companies, new entrants and commercial insurance companies would need to increase insurance coverage by 5% in these areas, according to the policy.
Much of San Diego’s inland and desert areas would be impacted by this change, state officials say. A map of all areas in the state impacted by this change can be found below.
In turn, insurance companies will be able to begin utilizing computerized catastrophe models to calculate its rates based on potential future risks, as they do in other states. California’s policies have historically been shaped by wildfire records within 20 year periods.
Insurance companies using these models would also be required to take into account how a policyholder might be mitigating wildfire risk at their property, state officials said.
Lara said utilizing this technology would help stabilize insurance in the state and make it more affordable — a sentiment echoed by insurers. However, critics argue catastrophe modeling can still contribute to unnecessary rate hikes, evidenced by hurricane-prone Florida’s exorbitantly high insurance prices.
According to state officials, all of the measures included in the latest policy, like the ability to use catastrophe models, would be subject to oversight by existing mechanisms.

author: ABr
title: Brest-Sturm Graz: "On est à 100% de taux de victoire", Chardonnet savoure le premier succès des Bretons en Ligue des champions
text:
Le capitaine du Stade Brestois, Brendan Chardonnet, n’a pas caché son bonheur après la victoire historique de Brest aux dépens de Sturm Graz (2-1), pour le premier match de son histoire en Ligue des champions, jeudi soir à Guingamp. Comme dans un rêve… Le Stade Brestois n’a pas manqué son premier rendez-vous avec la Ligue des champions. Après une qualification historique à l’issue de la saison 2023-2024, la formation du Finistère est entrée sans complexe dans la compétition, face à Sturm Graz jeudi à Roudourou. Grâce à une belle volée de Magnetti et un but de Sima, Brest s’est imposé 2-1 .
Au soir de la première journée de la C1 nouvelle formule, l’équipe brestoise pointe à la 12e place, devant des géants d’Europe comme Manchester City, l’Inter ou le Barça. En attendant un prochain sur la pelouse du RB Salzbourg, Brendan Chardonnet savoure son bonheur.
>> Le 1er classement de la Ligue des champions
"La victoire de tout un groupe" "Il fallait le gagner", a commenté à chaud le capitaine du SB29 sur Canal+. "Le but nous a fait mal avant la mi-temps, mais on a su se ressaisir. Ça fait plaisir! On n’a pas beaucoup de marge, on se donnera à fond. On l’a vu ce soir, c’est mérité! C’est la victoire de tout un groupe, ça fait quelque chose de voir Brest en Ligue des champions. Maintenant, au boulot encore!"
Et Chardonnet de plaisanter: "On est à 100% de taux de victoire!" Après Salzbourg, Brest affrontera le Bayer Leverkusen, le Slavia Prague, le Barça, le PSV Eindhoven, le Chakhtior Donetsk et le Real Madrid.

author: maisnovela
title: Exagerou? Web se surpreende com look de Rafa Justus para renovação de votos do pai
text:
Exagerou? Web se surpreende com look de Rafa Justus para renovação de votos do pai
Look de Rafa Justus para renovação de votos do pai, Roberto Justus, com Ana Paula Siebert rouba a cena
Rafa Justus caprichou na produção para marcar presença na renovação de votos do pai, o apresentador Roberto Justus, com a influenciadora Ana Paula Siebert. O evento acontece na noite desta quarta-feira, 30/04, data que o casal celebra 10 anos de casados.
Para a ocasião, a adolescente de 15 anos apostou em um vestido pra lá de luxuso. Rafa usou um modelito metálico com fenda, além de sandálias marrons, para curtir a festa.
A roupa da herdeira de Ticiane Pinheiro e Roberto deu o que falar: "Nossa Rafa, lindíssima, zero defeitos", elogiou uma internauta. "Verdadeira deusa", elogiou outra pessoa. "Roupa de mulher adulta", criticou a terceira.
Ver essa foto no Instagram
Renovação de votos de Ana Paula e Roberto Justus
Ana Paula Siebert e Roberto Justus organizaram uma festa luxuosa no Clube Atlético Monte Líbano, em São Paulo, para celebrar esse momento tão especial. O evento contará com quatrocentos convidados, cenografia inédita, mais de quatro mil docinhos, cerca de 200 mil flores e um show surpresa.
Mais cedo, enquanto se arrumava, a famosa abriu o coração em conversa com os fãs no Instagram. "Estou aqui me arrumando! Enfim chegou o dia! Eu estou tão ansiosa! Eu sou uma pessoa que não sou ansiosa, todo mundo sabe, eu sou bem de boa para tudo, resolvo tudo em cima da hora. Mas hoje eu acordei ansiosa! Estou muito feliz, vai ser um dia duplamente especial: aniversário do Roberto, 70 anos dele, e nossa renovação dos dez anos de casados. Não vejo a hora de entrar porque vai ser assim: 'deu tudo certo'", contou.
